scripts.bundle:api: node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('tmp', { recursive: true });" && npm exec swagger-cli -- bundle ../docs/api/v1/openapi.yaml -o tmp/openapi.bundled.json -t json && node scripts/resolve-openapi.js
scripts.generate:api: npm run bundle:api && npm exec openapi-generator-cli generate -- -i tmp/openapi.resolved.json -g typescript-axios -o src/client --additional-properties=withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,supportsES6=true,apiPackage=apis,modelPackage=models
